param.label: Processors
param.name: processors
param.help: Number of processing cores, 'ppn' value (1-24). Leave blank to use default value.

param.label: Memory
param.name: memory
param.help: Memory size in GB, 'pmem' value (1-256). Leave blank to use default value.

param.label: Time
param.name: time
param.help: Maximum job time in hours, 'walltime' value (1-120). Leave blank to use default value.

param.label: Queue (Mammouth ONLY)
param.name: queue
param.help: Modify this option to use on of the default queue set ups.
param.option: qtest3_short, 24 cores, 32 RAM, walltime 15 min (short jobs. Lowest waiting time)
qwork_extended 24 cores 32GB RAM walltime 120 Hours (CPU-time intensive)
qfat256, 48 cores, 256 RAM, walltime 120 Hours (High memory requirement)
qfat512, 48 cores, 512 RAM, walltime 48 Hours (Highest memory requirement. Limited walltime.)
